title: NFC Burning Offseason Questions, Mailbag Pt. 2 (Football 2/14)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to tackle the NFC's burning offseason questions and hit part 2 of the latest Pick Six mailbag. The guys start with Dallas and how free agency could play out for Dak Prescott, Amari Cooper and Byron Jones (2:45). Next, what's the deal with the quarterback position in New Orleans (10:30)? The Superfriends pick between Drew Brees, Teddy Bridgewater and Taysom Hill. Cam Newton and Jameis Winston are other QBs with uncertain futures that are discussed. Finally, Will, Ryan, John and Sean answer questions from 5-star reviews left on Apple Podcasts (22:30).

Note: This episode was recorded on Tuesday.

Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod @WillBrinson, @RyanWilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @seanjwagner
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en

itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: Could the Cowboys move on from Dak? Does Drew Brees have any time left in New Orleans? The Pick Six Superfriends answer these questions and more.
